title-part.text: ARTICLES FOR WRITING OR DRAWING UPON;

reference.text: workshop equipment for marking-out work B25H7/00; teaching hand-writing or drawing G09B11/00

note.note-paragraph: Devices used for both teaching and facilitating writing or drawing are classified in G09B11/00)

title-part.text: Articles for writing or drawing upon
Repeatedly-usable boards or tablets for writing or drawing

CPC-specific-text.text: wall mounting or suspension arrangements for blackboards or the like A47B97/001

reference.text: ; easels or stands for blackboards A47B97/04

title-part.text: having transluscent writing surfaces producing visual impressions by co-operation with backing members
Writing or drawing underlays, e.g. blotting pads

reference.text: bracelets with means for attaching a writing instrument or a memo pad A44C5/0046; for attachment to shopping trolleys B62B3/1428
drawing desks or tables A47B27/00, A47B85/02; stands for drawing-boards A47B97/04

CPC-specific-text.text: drawing copying devices using a transparency

title-part.text: having means for clamping sheets of paper thereto

reference.text: guides; curve rulers or templets B43L13/20; straightedges characterised by the provision of indicia or the like for measuring, e.g. rulers or tapes with measuring scales or marks for direc reading, G01B

note.note-paragraph: In this group, the following term is used with the meaning indicated: "straightedge" means an instrument or its edge serving the purpose of acting as a guide for the drawing of a straight line.

title-part.text: Plural non-adjustable straightedges fixed at right angles
Plural non-adjustable straightedges forming non-right angles
with arrangements for attaching additional drawing equipment e.g. for hatching, dotting

CPC-specific-text.text: Comprising at least two straightedges remaining parallel

title-part.text: with legs formed by flat springs
with changeable leg-ends for conversion into compasses, dividers, or callipers
Features common to compasses, dividers, and callipers
Means for mounting points or writing appliances on legs
with cords or like flexible elements

CPC-specific-text.text: magnetic holding means for T-squares: B43L7/023

title-part.text: Drawing instruments, or writing or drawing appliances or accessories not otherwise provided for
Draughting machines or drawing devices for keeping parallelism

reference.text: apparatus for recording measured values G01D; Control systems for drawing machines G06K15/22, G06F3/13

CPC-specific-text.text: Hand held or associated with the writing instrument

title-part.text: Pantographic instruments for copying, enlarging, or diminishing

reference.text: arrangements for copying in machine tools B23Q

CPC-specific-text.text: using copying or multiple drawing arrangements

reference.text: optical systems or apparatus G02B; projectors G03B

title-part.text: Devices for generating stepwise movements of drawing equipment, e.g. for hatching
Supports for attachment to hands or arms for facilitating writing or drawing

reference.text: blotting pads B43L3/00; combined with writing implements B43K29/04; making blotting paper D21F11/14

title-part.text: using blotting material other than paper

reference.text: rubbers or erasing knives combined with writing implements B43K29/02, B43K29/18

CPC-specific-text.text: Eraser or rubber material, e.g. comprising hard particles
Erasing by electronic or electrolytic means

title-part.text: with means for absorbing the chalk dust

reference.text: grinding or cutting tools in general B24; B26; combined with writing implements B43K29/06

CPC-specific-text.text: with continuous conveying means for the pencil

title-part.text: in which the pencils or leads are sharpened by only axial movement against cutting blades
in which the pencils or leads are sharpened mainly by rotational movement against cutting blades

CPC-specific-text.text: one of the blades being used for shaping the writing point

reference.text: liquid receptacles in general B65D, e.g. B65D1/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Caps or closure means for ink receptacles

reference.text: closure means for containers in general B65D

CPC-specific-text.text: Ink receptacles with solid ink; Non reversable receptacles
Ink receptacles incorporated in a table or a bench
Portable ink receptacles; Filling devices for receptacles

title-part.text: with arrangements for dissolving ink powder
having means for securing objects thereon
